handleConnections

protected void handleConnections()
                          throws SignalAlreadyConnectedException
Throws:
SignalAlreadyConnectedException

connect

public void connect(Signal targetSignal)
             throws SignalAlreadyConnectedException
used to connect a remote signal input to a signal. One remote signal input can be connected to multiple signals. The connection is unidirectional: Changes of the connecting remote signal input (remoteSignalInput) will be propagated to the signals it is connected to (targetSignal): remoteSignalInput.connect(targetSignal).

Parameters:
targetSignal -
Throws:
SignalAlreadyConnectedException
